description:
True Fear: Forsaken Souls combines the best of the psychological thriller with intuitive gameplay mechanics for a mind-bending mystery escape game.
If you're looking for a horror game that doesn’t sacrifice the story, this is the game for you!
Skeptical that a point and click adventure can be compelling or scary? Try the free demo!

Main Features:
- An intense adventure brimming with psychological suspense in a plot filled with twists and turns.
- Choose your adventure! Play with or without the hidden object scenes.
- Play using Joy-Con™, Pro Controller or touch screen.
- Unlock 40 achievements, find 15 collectibles.
- Includes the bonuses from the Collector's version of True Fear: Forsaken Soul: an additional level, wallpapers, making of and deleted content.
- True Fear: Forsaken Souls Part I is the first game of the trilogy.
name: True Fear: Forsaken Souls - Part 1
